”Alexa turn on bedroom light”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
IoTCasa is a brand developed by IoTMinds Innovations Private Limited catering to development of smart IoT Products which help consumers switch to smarter lifestyle. Our innovative products & services are developed with advanced technologies and security protocols.

About IoTCASA Skill:

This skill is developed to add Amazon Alexa based voice control to your smart home devices registered with IoTCasa mobile application. Using this skill, you will be able to control your IoTCasa devices via Amazon Alexa mobile application or via voice.

Enabling IoTCasa skill

Before enabling IoTCasa skill, please make sure you have created a valid user account on the IoTCasa mobile application and also discovered your IoTCasa smart home devices to your user account.

1. Search for the IoTCasa skill on the Amazon Alexa “Skill & Games” section.
2. Tap on “Enable to Use” button to enable the smart home IoTCasa skill.
3. Enter your IoTCasa User account credentials to authorisation and linking the IoTCasa skill to IoTCasa cloud.
4. Tap on “Discover Devices” on the Amazon Alexa mobile application.

All your smart home devices registered with your IoTCasa user account shall get listed on Amazon Alexa application.

Additional Information:

-Download IoTCasa mobile application from Google Play store and iOS App Store 
- Refer to the link below to know more about the products and services offered by IoTMinds Innovations Private Limited for their IoTCasa devices.

Support
For any further support or assistance with the IoTCasa devices and IoTCasa skill for Amazon Alexa, please reach out to us at support@iotminds.in or contact us on +91-72076 00801.
